listeningQuestion.question: How far did the girl swim?

content.editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个关于生存的故事，描述了一个女孩在海上遇险后，如何在黑暗中游泳求生的经历。课文使用了多个方向性介词和时间状语从句，展现了故事的戏剧性和紧张感。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: Nearly a week passed before the girl was able to explain what had happened to her.
One afternoon she set out from the coast in a small boat and was caught in a storm.
Towards evening, the boat struck a rock and the girl jumped into the sea.
Then she swam to the shore after spending the whole night in the water.
During that time she covered a distance of eight miles.
Early next morning, she saw a light ahead.
She knew she was near the shore because the light was high up on the cliffs.
On arriving at the shore, the girl struggled up the cliff towards the light she had seen.
When she woke up a day later, she found herself in hospital.

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 几乎过了一个星期，那姑娘才能讲述自己的遭遇。
一天下午，她乘小船从海岸出发，遇上了风暴。
天将黑时，小船撞在了一块礁石上，姑娘跳进了海里。
她在海里游了整整一夜才游到岸边。
在那段时间里，她游了8英里。
第二天凌晨，她看到前方有灯光。
她知道自己已经接近岸边了，因为那灯光是在高高的峭壁上。
到达岸边后，姑娘朝着她看到的灯光方向挣扎着往峭壁上爬去。
第二天她醒来时，发现自己躺在医院里。

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.title: 方向性介词的用法
content: 课文中出现了多个表示方向的介词，如towards（朝向）, into（进入）, up（向上）等。
towards强调越来越近，而to只强调方向。
例句：She struggled up the cliff towards the light.

notes.title: 时间状语从句
content: before引导的时间状语从句：Nearly a week passed before...
when引导的时间状语从句：When she woke up...
on + 动名词结构作时间状语：On arriving at the shore...

notes.title: be able to的用法
content: be able to强调有能力且能够成功，而can只表示能力。
例句：The girl was able to explain what had happened to her.
这里暗示她不仅有能力解释，而且实际上解释了。

notes.title: 过去完成时的使用
content: 用于表示过去某一时间点之前发生的动作。
例句：...what had happened to her.

notes.example: She set out from the coast in a small boat.

notes.context: 表示突然遇到不好的情况
notes.example: She was caught in a storm.
She covered a distance of eight miles.

notes.translation: 发现自己（处于某种状态）
notes.context: 表示突然意识到自己的处境

multipleChoice.question: How long did it take before the girl could explain what had happened?
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文开头提到'Nearly a week passed before the girl was able to explain...'

multipleChoice.question: How far did the girl swim?
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文中提到'During that time she covered a distance of eight miles.'

multipleChoice.question: How did she know she was near the shore?
options: She saw a light on the cliffs
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文提到'She knew she was near the shore because the light was high up on the cliffs.'

fillInBlanks.sentence: The boat _____ a rock and the girl jumped into the sea.
Early next morning, she saw a light _____.

notes.title: 词语辨析
notes.content: 课文中出现了几个表示'海岸'的词：coast（地理意义上的海岸）, shore（一般的海岸）, seashore（适合游玩的海滩）, seaside（海边）。这些词在使用场景上有细微的区别。

notes.title: 写作特点
notes.content: 文章采用了时间顺序的叙事方式，从遇险、求生到获救，层层推进，突出了主人公在险境中的坚强意志。

notes.title: pass和past的用法区别
notes.content: pass是动词，其过去式和过去分词是passed；past可以作形容词、介词、名词等，表示'过去的、经过、往事'等含义。
